## Installing Software

* Macalester RStudio server: login at <macalester.edu/rstudio>.  Account names and passwords available from Danny. 

Alternatively ...   

* Install desktop version: 
    1. Install R: <http://cran.rstudio.com/>
    2. Install preview edition of RStudio: <http://www.rstudio.com/products/rstudio/download/preview/>
    3. Windows only ... install Rtools: <http://cran.r-project.org/bin/windows/Rtools/Rtools32.exe>
* Install packages
    * An experiment.  Cut and paste then run these lines in your console:
        ```r
install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_url("http://dtkaplan.github.io/Muhlenberg/YourCourse_0.2.tar.gz")
```
    * Otherwise: from "Packages" tab: `devtools`, `mosaic`, `knitr`, `rmarkdown`, `dplyr`, `ggplot2`
